EmailTemplate.description: Introducing NCR’s ATM as a Service Re-thinking self-service – ATM as a Service
EmailTemplate.name: 05-02-22 BNK ATMaaS Email 1.Subject Line Test
EmailTemplate.subject: Introducing NCR's ATM as a Service
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Managing your ATM channel can be time consuming, costly and complex. But what if it didn’t have to be? What if you had a trusted partner to take on vendor management, regulatory compliance, security patching and other tasks? With ATM as a Service, it is possible. ATM as a Service allows you to focus on your customers and deliver a better experience all while knowing your ATM channel is being taken care of by a trusted partner. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> © 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
